caption:
Tune into features that are straight from the future ✨
The new JBL Tune Beam 2 is a game changer, it’s got Hybrid Adaptive ANC to shut out the chaos, and JBL Spatial Sound that drops you right into your playlist, movie, or game. And with Relax mode, let your stress take a day off.

And guess what, these buds also comes with a 2-year extended warranty (yup, 12+12 months!) for a limited time.

Early birds, this one’s for you, grab it at just ₹5,XXX. Mark your calendars: drops April 17! Use code JBLXSARATH at checkout on in.jbl.com for an extra 10% off.

Click the link in bio to stay in the loop.
